actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reduce the maximum corporate rate of tax to 22 percent.
short_title: Keeping American Businesses Competitive Act of 2010

summary.text: Keeping American Businesses Competitive Act of 2010 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to reduce the maximum income tax rate on corporations, including personal service corporations, from 35 to 22%.

titles.title: Keeping American Businesses Competitive Act of 2010
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reduce the maximum corporate rate of tax to 22 percent.
